title: IF THERE IS NO JUSTICE I WILL ACT INDEPENDENTLY IN PARLIAMENT: RANGE
content: News Courtesy:  News First In the event that there is no justice meted out to him by the United National Party (UNP) on the assault against him, he would be compelled to act independently in parliament in future, says parliamentarian Palitha Range Bandara.
